title: The Tiny Wife
description: A robber charges into a bank with a loaded gun, but instead of taking any money he steals an item of sentimental value from each person. Strange things start to happen to the victims after he escapes: A tattoo comes to life; a husband turns into a snowman; a baby starts to defecate money. And Stacey Hinterland discovers she's shrinking a little every day. Nothing she or her husband can do will reverse the process. Can Stacey and the other victims find a solution before it is too late?
author: Andrew Kaufman
